title: AEC Asansol: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Ranking
meta_description: AEC Asansol Admission 2024 is open for B.Tech and other degree courses based on JEE Main, WBJEE and other state level entrance exam scores. Check latest updates and news on AEC AsansolAdmission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placement, Ranking

basic_info.name: AEC Asansol Courses
description: The college offers both UG and PG courses in different fields. The basic eligibility and course fees are tabulated below:

basic_info.name: AEC Asansol Admission
description: The college offers UG and PG programmes with various specializations. The admission to B.Tech, MCA and M.Tech is made through entrance exams and for other courses; the college follows a merit based system for selection. The basic eligibility for UG courses is that the students should have completed 10+2 and for PG courses the students must have completed their Graduation.

Candidates can find all the information regarding applications forms, counselling dates and fee structures on the official website. After the allotment of seats in counselling, the applicants can do the further formalities for admission in the college.

basic_info.name: AEC Asansol Placements
description: Asansol Engineering College has a proper Placement and Training cell which overlooks the development of students and is responsible for conducting placement drives. Both internships and placements are offered by the College.

The students get offers from both core Engineering and non- Core companies. Around 350 job offers were made by mass recruiting companies. Some of the major recruiters of 2019 placement session are listed below:
Persistent System offered INR 6.41 LPA to students of AEC, Asansol. The highest package bagged was for INR 7.5 Lakhs as of now. However, the average package is around INR 4.5 Lakhs.
Students from CSE Department bagged maximum offers.

basic_info.name: AEC Asansol Scholarships
description: The College offers scholarships to the needy students but they need to meet certain eligibility criteria as there is an entrance exam for scholarship. They need to maintain good academic results throughout college.

The scholarships are initiated by the State Government or Central Government for the meritorious and reserved categories. The institute offers scholarships under the name of ‘Freeship’ to students who performed well in academics.

Section.name: About AEC Asansol
Section.description:
Asansol Engineering College is a self financed institute and was established in 1998. The college is spread over a campus of around 17 acres and is affiliated to Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology (MAKAUT). It has also been approved by AICTE. The institute offers courses both in UG and PG domain such as B.Tech, M.Tech, MCA, etc. Located in Asansol, West Bengal, the college offers all the basic facilities like sports complex, gym, library, etc. The college has approximately 3000 students and 200 faculty members and lab assistants.
The college keeps on enhancing its Research and Development programmes and aims at achieving academic excellence. Apart from this, it also focuses to reap the benefit of its proximity to industries for IRG through testing and consultancy.
Check AEC Asansol Admission
The college offers both UG and PG courses in different fields. The basic eligibility and course fees are tabulated below:
Check AEC Asansol Course and Fee
The college offers UG and PG programmes with various specializations. The admission to B.Tech, MCA and M.Tech is made through entrance exams and for other courses; the college follows a merit based system for selection. The basic eligibility for UG courses is that the students should have completed 10+2 and for PG courses the students must have completed their Graduation.
Candidates can find all the information regarding applications forms, counselling dates and fee structures on the official website. After the allotment of seats in counselling, the applicants can do the further formalities for admission in the college.
Asansol Engineering College has a proper Placement and Training cell which overlooks the development of students and is responsible for conducting placement drives. Both internships and placements are offered by the College.
The students get offers from both core Engineering and non- Core companies. Around 350 job offers were made by mass recruiting companies. Some of the major recruiters of 2019 placement session are listed below:
Persistent System offered INR 6.41 LPA to students of AEC, Asansol. The highest package bagged was for INR 7.5 Lakhs as of now. However, the average package is around INR 4.5 Lakhs.
Students from CSE Department bagged maximum offers.
The College offers scholarships to the needy students but they need to meet certain eligibility criteria as there is an entrance exam for scholarship. They need to maintain good academic results throughout college.
The scholarships are initiated by the State Government or Central Government for the meritorious and reserved categories. The institute offers scholarships under the name of ‘Freeship’ to students who performed well in academics.
The college provides all the basic facilities to its students on its campus only. The infrastructure of the campus is quite well built with facilities like:
The faculty of AEC Asansol is highly qualified and is expert in teaching in their respective subjects. Here is a list of some of the faculty members with various specializations:

Ques. Do all the courses offered by AEC Asansol is approved/ recognized?
Ans. Yes, all the coursed are duly approved by the applicable Govt. authority:
Ques. Is residing in hostels compulsory at AEC Asansol?
Ans. No, staying in a hostel is not compulsory for the students of AEC Asansol. Students can opt to daily come to college by their own means. However, Hostel facility is available if students want to opt for hostels.
Ques. Is there any special training provided to students apart from course syllabus at AEC Asansol?
Ans. Yes, AEC Asansol provides personality development and soft skills training to its students so that they can perform well in campus placement interviews. Finishing School Programs (FSP) are also there for all branches.
Ques. Can a student residing outside of Bengal apply for reservation quota offered by AEC Asansol?
Ans. Since AEC Asansol is a self financed institute, it does not offer any reservation quota on any grounds.
